name: O.R.A. Core Blueprint Package
desc: Enables heavy industry to construct the common ship hulls from the "Outer Rim Alliance" school of design.

name: O.R.A. Advanced Blueprint Package
desc: Enables heavy industry to construct the best ship hulls from the "Outer Rim Alliance" school of design.

name: O.R.A. Weapons Blueprint Package
desc: Enables heavy industry to construct weapons, and fighter LPCs from the "Outer Rim Alliance" school of design.
